name: Y3T (Neil Hill) â€“ 3-Week Cycle
intensity_range: From heavy to moderate-high to very high reps
time_per_session_breakdown: 4-5 exercises per muscle, sets vary, each week rep ranges shift
overview_and_execution: Week1: heavier loads, 6-10 reps. Week2: moderate loads, 10-14 reps. Week3: lighter loads, 20+ reps. This cycles hypertrophy stimuli to shock growth. Then repeat.
example_application: Legs: W1 (6-10), W2(10-14), W3(20-25). Adjust loads so you approach failure in each range.
important_notes: Intense. Variation in rep ranges helps overall hypertrophy. Each cycle is 3 weeks, then you can repeat with heavier loads.
volume_metrics: Total sets depends on exercise selection and intensities each week
